meta.content: We will be distributing meals for any child ages 2 – 18. We will be doing distributions on Mondays for 3 meals (M, T, & W) and Thursdays for 4 meals (Th, F, S, S). Additionally, Backpack …

body.class: post-template-default single single-post postid-14563 single-format-standard custom-background

div.p: Home » Home » Meal Distribution during Covid-19: Week 7

div.class: post-14563 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-home
div.div: By Jacob Painter in Home on April 23, 2020.

div.h5: We will be distributing meals for any child ages 2 – 18. We will be doing distributions on Mondays for 3 meals (M, T, & W) and Thursdays for 4 meals (Th, F, S, S). Additionally, Backpack deliveries will be provided each Thursday. Please sign up HERE the day prior of each delivery (each Sunday and Wednesday) by 2:00 pm if you would like to receive meals.
div.p: We will be delivering to the following locations and times each day:

ul.li: Parking Lot Across from Community Center (1:15 pm – 1:45 pm)
Mill Creek United Methodist Church Parking Lot (12:45 pm – 1:15 pm)
Stone Creek Valley Fire Company Parking Lot (12:45 pm – 1:15 pm)
Marklesburg Fire Hall Parking Lot (12:45 pm – 1:15 pm)

div.h5: Meal sign-ups for April 27th and 30th are located here: https://forms.gle/1dtwkn2zvURqSzmA8
